channel.title: CVE Feed for MiCODUS -- MV720
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MiCODUS -- MV720

item.title: CVE-2022-2141|2024-08-03T00:24:44.276Z -- micodus -- mv720
item.description: SMS-based GPS commands can be executed by MiCODUS MV720 GPS tracker without authentication.

item.title: CVE-2022-2199|2024-08-03T00:32:08.715Z -- micodus -- mv720
item.description: The main MiCODUS MV720 GPS tracker web server has a reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability that could allow an attacker to gain control by tricking a user into making a request.

item.title: CVE-2022-2107|2024-08-03T00:24:44.192Z -- micodus -- mv720
item.description: The MiCODUS MV720 GPS tracker API server has an authentication mechanism that allows devices to use a hard-coded master password. This may allow an attacker to send SMS commands directly to the GPS tracker as if they were coming from the GPS ownerâ€™s mobile number.
